about_the_game:
Are you ready to revolutionize your RPG campaigns by easily creating unique animated maps?


Black Box Map Maker is the state-of-the-art AI-powered mapmaking tool developed through the latest gaming technology. Create unique ultra-realistic animated maps with the largest variety of themes, scenarios, rooms, and digital props ever seen in the RPG universe. It’s easy, fast and immersive. Then, share, print or enjoy it in your favorite VTT. It is as much fun as playing your favorite video game!

Select a theme from an impressive ever-growing list (Medieval Themes, Cthulhu, Cyberpunk, Sci-Fi and many more)


Infinite map creation possibilities with the largest variety of ultra-realistic and inspiring maps, scenarios and objects.

Create the most amazing maps and scenarios


With the help of the Black Box Map Maker AI, state-of-the-art maps will be created easily and fast, fully and beautifully furnished. You can continue easily adding scenarios and other elements to your 3D animated maps. And if you don’t like what you get, simply randomize how many times you want ! Your creation possibilities are endless!

Customize any elements from the largest variety of unique and special objects and props you have ever seen in your life


Customize your RPG animated scenarios with the largest variety of high-quality ultra-realistic objects you have ever seen in your life (more than 8,000 digital objects and props). You can easily modify floors, walls, lighting, or any single object you want.
Add, remove, scale, rotate, change colors and place objects anywhere on your map.
Change the color, range and intensity of the lights

Add amazing special effects and interact with the envoriment for great immersion


  • Add fantastic soundtracks and special effects such as animated animals, day-for-night, magic statues, magic portals, traps, hidden traps, fireplaces, torches, terrific digital stickers, and many more.
  • Open and close doors and cabinets
  • Add premium miniatures signed by world renowned sculptors

Craft awesome dirt roads, paths, rivers, lakes, chasms, hills and bridges


Black Box can easily build the natural element you want, making your campaign even more exciting!

Share with the community


  • Inspire and be inspired by RPG fans around the globe!
  • You can easily create unique maps and objects from your customizations and share your art pieces with the community.

Enjoy your amazing animated map creations in isometric, 3D first-person, 3D full (free view), and top view 2D perspectives.
Export to your favorite VTT through the following formats : universal, image (JPG and PNG), WEBM and MP4
Print your art piece in high quality definition
We promise you: to create your ultimate RPG maps and scenarios with Black Box Map Maker is as much fun as playing your favorite video game!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Graphics card
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Graphics card
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Black Box Map Maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 10.0 compliant video card with at least 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 10.0 compliant video card with at least 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Revolutionize your RPG campaigns! Black Box is the state-of-the-art AI-powered animated map generator developed through the latest gaming technology. Create unique and ultra-realistic 3D maps with the largest variety of themes, scenarios, and objects. It's immersive, user-friendly, fun and fast!
